import JDInput from "./components/JDInput"; import CoverLetterEditor from "./components/CoverLetterEditor"; import ColdEmailGenerator from "./components/ColdEmailGenerator"; function App() { return (

Resume Tailor App

Paste Job Description

Paste the job description here to generate tailored resume sections, cover letters, and cold emails.

This app uses the Gemini API to generate content based on the job description you provide.

Please ensure that the job description is clear and detailed for the best results.

Note: The generated content is a suggestion and should be reviewed before use.

); } export default App;
